{{Wired embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSL-2500U |revision=/BRU/D D1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6332 |cpu1_cspeed=240 |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL016A |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=1 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, JP2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:1B:DA, 00:1C:F0 }} '''D-Link DSL-2500U/BRU/D rev. D1''' - ADSL/ADSL2/ADSL2+ modem (router/bridge). Distributed in the Russia only. D-Link Part number: ISL2500UBERU6D1G (with firmware ver. RU_1.00). <gallery caption="Images of D-Link DSL-2500U/BRU/D h/w ver. D1"> File:DSL-2500U BRU D Front.jpg|Front view File:DSL-2500U BRU D D1 back view.jpg|Rear view File:DSL-2500U_BRU_D_D1_bottom.jpg|Bottom cover File:DSL-2500U_BRU_D_D1_board.jpg|Board </gallery>
The processor is part BCM6332KFBG.
== See also == * [ftp://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/ADSL/DSL-2500U_BRU_D/ DSL-2500U/BRU/D] directory on D-link FTP archive. * [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dsl-2500u D-Link DSL 2500U] in OpenWRT Wiki * [http://pudeev.livejournal.com/35872.html D-Link DSL-25xxU/BRU/x] in the blog of Michael V. Pudeev (russian) * [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dsl-2500u DSL-2500U] in OpenVRT Wiki * [http://chairday.narod.ru/DSL-2500U.html Reconnect PPPoE on modem DSL-2500U] (russian) [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::internal| ]]
